import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getAllConnectedPages, getConnectedPagesProject, getConnectedPagesPosts } from '../actions' import PageCart from '../components/PageCart' import ButtonActiveted from '../components/ButtonActiveted' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Agent(props) { const [seletedPage, setSelectedPage] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { props.getallConnectedPage() }, []) const handelClick = (idPage) => { console.log(idPage) props.getPagePosts(idPage) const selectedPage = props.allConnectedPages.find(el => el.idPage == idPage) setSelectedPage(selectedPage) } return (

Pages connected

{Object.keys(props.allConnectedPages).map(el =>
handelClick(props.allConnectedPages[el].idPage)}>
)}


{seletedPage && { props.allposts.map(el => {/* */} ) }
Picture Message Type Published Action Edit project
{el.hasOwnProperty('picture') ? : {el.hasOwnProperty('picture') ? : } {new Date(el.created_time).toLocaleDateString()}
{new Date(el.created_time).toLocaleTimeString()}		 Element.post.idPost == el.idPost)} allposts={props.allposts} seletedPage={seletedPage} />
}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { const allProjects = state.allPosts.filter(el => state.allProjects.map(Element => Element.post.idPost == el.idPost)) console.log('posts has project ', allProjects) return { allConnectedPages: state.allConnectedPages, allposts: state.allPosts, allProjects: state.allProjects } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { getallConnectedPage: () => dispatch(getAllConnectedPages()), getPagePostProject: () => dispatch(getConnectedPagesProject()), getPagePosts: (pageid) => dispatch(getConnectedPagesPosts(pageid)), } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Agent)
